```{r, echo = TRUE}
sumdiag <- function(A){
  s = c()
  for (row in 1:nrow(A))
    s = c(s, sum(A[row, ])+sum(A[, row]))-A[row, row]
  x = diag(s, 3)
}

A <- matrix(c(0, 1, 2, 3, 0,4, 5, 6, 0), nrow = 3, ncol = 3)
print(sumdiag(A))
```

```{r}
skc <- function(n){
digits <- as.numeric(unlist(strsplit(as.character(n), "")))
x = sum(digits**2)
}

n <- 12
print(skc(n))
```
